doc:description.doc:para: Takes a screenshot of the window that is currently under the mouse cursor.

doc:description.doc:para: Takes a screenshot of a rectangular region.
The user is prompted to select the region to capture. If Spectacle was started via D-Bus, it exits after the shot has been taken.
